Hymn.Arabic: بإسم الرب دعوت , يارب نج نفسى .
Hymn.English: 4 Then I called upon the name of the Lord: O Lord, I implore You, deliver my soul!

Hymn.Arabic: الرب هو رحوم وصديق , وإلهنا يرحم ,
Hymn.English: 5 Gracious is the Lord, and righteous; Yes, our God is merciful.

Hymn.Arabic: الذى يحفظ الأطفال هو الرب , إتضعت فخلصنى  الليلويا
Hymn.English: 6 The Lord preserves the simple; I was brought low, and He saved me.     Alleluia
